About The Author

The Author

Shilpa Patel is from a small New England town and moved to Michigan in 2003. Her passions are traveling and unraveling mysteries. As a daughter of immigrant parents, she’s had the opportunity to travel back to her ancestral home of India. During her travels, she always wanted to share her journey with her friends.

In 2007 after the birth of her daughter Maya, she realized the importance of instilling the same unique ancestral values as well as teaching her the culture of New England. With her daughter being born in Michigan, Shilpa also had the responsibility to teach and embrace the Michigan culture. Through these transitions she continued to develop her values and learn about the natural beauty that surrounds us, no matter where we may live.

The inspiration behind Bongo’s Books is to help educate children and allow families to share personal values with their friends and loved ones. Through imaginary, travel, and shared experiences, one can relate to other people’s stories. Plus, what’s more fun than solving riddles and a mystery along the way?

The Illustrator

Illustrator Zoe Ranucci has an independent graphic design and illustration studio in Belmont, North Carolina (just outside of Charlotte). She has illustrated several full color children’s books as well as instructional and educational guides. Zoe enjoys character development most of all, watching each her creations come to life in the pages of her books. Please take a moment to visit her portfolio website at www.gooddharma.com to view more of her work.
